Worosoft excels in architecting small to large enterprise software covering web, desktop and mobile devices using .NET and native Qt C++ technologies.
our technologies expertise focuses mainly but not limited to the following:

  • C#
  • C/C++
  • WCF
  • ASP.NET MVC
  • WPF
  • WinRT
  • QML
  • HTML5/JS (angularJs, app UI, typescript)/CSS3
  • Win32 api
